mapper.select: select `id` as `id`, `role_id` as `roleId`, `username` as `userName`, `password` as `password`, `status` as `status`, `email` as `email`, `phone` as `phone`, `create_date` as `createDate` from `sys_user` where `id` = #{value}

select `id` as `id`, `role_id` as `roleId`, `username` as `userName`, `password` as `password`, `status` as `status`, `email` as `email`, `phone` as `phone`, `create_date` as `createDate` from `sys_user` where `userName` = #{userName}

select u.`id` as `id`, u.`role_id` as `roleId`, u.`username` as `userName`, u.`password` as `password`, u.`status` as `status`, u.`email` as `email`, u.`phone` as `phone`, u.`create_date` as `createDate`, ur.`role_name` as `roleName` from `sys_user` u LEFT JOIN `user_role` ur on u.`role_id` = ur.`id`
AND `username` like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
AND `status` like concat('%',#{status},'%')
AND `email` like concat('%',#{email},'%')
AND `phone` like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by `id` desc
limit #{offset}, #{rows}

select count(*) from `sys_user`
AND `username` like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
AND `status` like concat('%',#{status},'%')
AND `email` like concat('%',#{email},'%')
AND `phone` like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
select ur.`role_name` from `sys_user` u LEFT JOIN `user_role` ur on u.`role_id` = ur.`id` where u.`id` = #{userId}
select rm.`menu_id` from `sys_user` u LEFT JOIN `user_role` ur on u.`role_id` = ur.`id` LEFT JOIN `role_menu` rm on ur.`id` = rm.`role_id` where u.`id` = #{userId}

select distinct m.`perms` from `sys_user` u LEFT JOIN `user_role` ur on u.`role_id` = ur.`id` LEFT JOIN `role_menu` rm on ur.`id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `menu` m on rm.`menu_id` = m.`id` where u.`id` = #{userId}
